ygData.subject: RE: Halfling Leatherfoot Raider Cap news...
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes but apparently you can get the current one still.  The first part of the quest gives out the current cap which is not halfling only and is only AC4, the
ygData.messageBody:
Yes but apparently you can get the current one still. The first part of the
quest gives out the current cap which is not halfling only and is only AC4,
the second part now involves the Dragoon weapon and this "petitioner's cap"
to get the new improved cap which is gawd awfully cool. AC:7 multiple stat
bonuses and get this 1 charge of Ring of Commons! Don't know if its
rechargeable or not but will soon.

Kitasi the quester

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 10:28 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Halfling Leatherfoot Raider Cap news...


From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

From EQlizer:
"With the last patch, the Leatherfoot Raider Skullcap Quest now rewards you
with a MUCH better headpiece, but HFL-only."

Talies

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
